system:
note description: "EiffelVision horizontal separator, gtk implementation" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_horizontal_separator_imp.xmlEV_HORIZONTAL_SEPARATOR_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_horizontal_separator_i.xmlEV_HORIZONTAL_SEPARATOR_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_horizontal_separator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_separator_imp.xmlEV_SEPARATOR_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_horizontal_separator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_horizontal_separator_imp.xml#f_makemake end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_horizontal_separator_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_horizontal_separator_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_horizontal_separator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create a horizontal gtk separator. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_horizontal_separator_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Create and initialize Current. local p: FalsePOINTER do ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_set_c_objectset_c_object ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_event_box_newgtk_event_box_new) p := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_hseparator_newgtk_hseparator_new {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_showgtk_widget_show (p) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_container_addgtk_container_add (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object, p) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_set_usizegtk_widget_set_usize (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object, -1, 1) ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_horizontal_separator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_horizontal_separator.xmlEV_HORIZONTAL_SEPARATOR note option: stable attribute end

end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_horizontal_separator_imp.xmlEV_HORIZONTAL_SEPARATOR_IMP
